statements: SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date, customer_id FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT MAX(feedback_date) AS latest_feedback_date FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY feedback_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND feedback_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT MAX(feedback_date) AS latest_feedback_date, MIN(feedback_date) AS oldest_feedback_date FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_models WHERE target_segment = 'Premium';
SELECT model_name, pricing_strategy FROM pricing_models ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT model_name, pricing_strategy FROM pricing_models WHERE target_segment = 'Enterprise';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, base_price FROM pricing_models WHERE base_price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date, customers.name FROM feedback JOIN customers ON feedback.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT model_name, base_price FROM pricing_models WHERE model_type = 'Subscription' ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customers.name, feedback_text FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY customers.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers, pricing_models WHERE customers.customer_id = 2 AND pricing_models.model_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE feedback_score > 3 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, feedback_timestamp FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id WHERE feedback_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, base_price, discount_rate FROM products p JOIN pricing_models pm ON p.product_id = pm.product_id WHERE discount_rate IS NOT NULL ORDER BY base_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE feedback_score > 4 ORDER BY feedback_score DESC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, category, price FROM customers JOIN products ON customers.customer_id = products.product_id WHERE customers.feedback_score > 3 AND products.price < 100 ORDER BY customers.customer_name DESC, products.price ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_timestamp FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_timestamp DESC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, base_price, discount_rate, price FROM customers JOIN pricing_models ON customers.customer_id = pricing_models.model_id JOIN products ON pricing_models.product_id = products.product_id WHERE discount_rate IS NOT NULL ORDER BY discount_rate DESC, price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, base_price, discount FROM pricing_models WHERE model_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_timestamp, sentiment_score FROM feedback_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT model_name, base_price, discount FROM pricing_models WHERE base_price > 100 ORDER BY discount DESC
SELECT analysis_id, customer_id, feedback_timestamp, sentiment_score FROM feedback_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
